name: Open Phone Operator Portability
short_description:
This project aims to build open source, the more simple, readable and autodocumented as possible so that different telephony operators, wired and mobile, can integrate their Information Systems this part vital and governed by the law of each country.

It is not possible to implement a solution that is worth for all operators. Each of them will have their peculiarities at the enterprise level and organization, as well as legal peculiarities.

This project provide tools and code necessary useful to develop and adapt the solution to each one. Taking into account the problems that everyone will have to resolve and manage: high availability, high performance, portability applications workflow, escalability,...
